cnbc.title: Tesla stock closes at 2025 high after Musk confirms driverless Robotaxi tests underway in Austin
cnbc.summary: Tesla CEO Elon Musk said in a social media post that his company is testing driverless cars in Austin without a safety driver in the vehicle.

cnbc.title: Trump doubles down on Rob Reiner criticism after killing; director's son in custody
cnbc.summary: Rob Reiner was a staunch Trump critic, recently saying, "we have a year before this country becomes a full-on autocracy, and democracy completely leaves us."

cnbc.title: Merriam-Webster declares 'slop' its word of the year in nod to growth of AI
cnbc.summary: Slop refers to the low-quality content created by artificial intelligence that's showing up across social media.
